short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to write the code in code editor rather than text area.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jivox Editor allows developers to write the code in code editor rather than text area. So developers can easily understand and edit the code. It supports html, js, css and json formats.
